sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns the width of a scroll bar. Useful when placing a scroll bar widget beneath or beside another widget or object.
sections.mdown_content: Returns the width of a scroll bar. Useful when placing a scroll bar widget beneath or beside another widget or object.

sections.title: Example
sections.raw_content: See the ScrollPic program in GUI.CreateHorizontalScrollBarFull for an example of GUI.GetScrollBarWidth.
sections.mdown_content: See the *ScrollPic* program in **GUI.CreateHorizontalScrollBarFull **for an example of **GUI.GetScrollBarWidth**.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.GetScrollBarWidth, not by calling GetScrollBarWidth.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **GUI.GetScrollBarWidth**, not by calling **GetScrollBarWidth**.
